Octociz and Brix

Octociz/Brix walked into the Cybertronian Fire behind the Maximal 
Bot. They could see the look of dispair on his face. The odds they 
would find another body were almost none. 

If only that damned Bronco didn't toss my body into the sea!, Octociz 
thought.

Deep within, Brix replied.

Watch it! That might have been a different me, but it's still me!

I can't wait until my thoughts are my own, thought Octociz

I heard that!, came the reply.

Octociz muttered to himself as he continued into the Cybertronian 
Fire.

Vulois

Vulois looked down at Battera, who was shivering with nerves. Vulois 
laughed.

"Stand up, noble beast! Don't you see? You can't blame yourself for 
it. You had a chance to escape. If you had died, than the plan of The 
Matrix would have been surely destroyed. It was destiny that you 
survived Hell Beast's rath. Now come, Cybershark has already gone 
inside, so shall we join him? You too, Soundwave."

Vulois went to catch up with Cybershark.
